message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value and your interest, I believe we can come to an agreement. I propose a price of $9500 for the product.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I'm interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value of the product and your interest, I propose a price of $9000 for the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I propose a price of $8000 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. Considering the value of the product and your budget constraints, I am willing to offer it to you for $8500.

I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $7500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget constraints.
I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer the product to you for $8000. This price reflects both the value of the product and your budget constraints.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $7800, but no lower. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget constraints.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. Considering the value of the product and your budget constraints, I am willing to offer it to you for $7900.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $7800, but I was thinking we could do a bit better than that. I'm willing to pay $7700 for the product. This is my final offer.
